Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Obulayi bubula mumaanji kabamonyanga halali basanjilananga okhurusia eshihanwa nohomba okhukhola amalayi nohomba ukhuraa halala abandu, mana ulakhola kano khukhwenya obuchami bwa Nyasaye khwitsa okhumuhelesia omurungo omukhongo

Ne ulia ukhaya ako Murumwa namalile okhunyoola obulunjifu mana naloonda injila ilali yobusuubili, khwitsa okhumushukhasia ashukhanile omwene mana khumwinjisie mumulilo, Ne ni habundu abi muno wokhurebwa

Toto Nyasaye shaleshelanga eshionono shiokhumutsokasia (okhumusanga) ninaye nende shiosishiosi tawe, halali aleshelanga kali hasi wa elo, khu ulia owayenya, ne utsokasia Nyasaye toto oyo aba akorere obukori obwahale muno
Shibalaamanga shiosi tawe nibekhola okhulaama Nyasaye, halali eminyasaye chieshikhasi, ne shibalaamanga halali shetani omukhayi
Nyasaye yamutsuba, mana naye (shetani) noboola mbu, “Toto esie nditsa okhubukula omukanda mubandu bo babe ebuleka wanje.”

Ne toto nditsa okhubakosia nende okhubasubisia nende okhubalomesia shingala ndenya, mana betsa okhuteta amarwi ketsisolo, Ne nditsa okhubalomesia bakalukhanie obulonji bwa Nyasaye, Ne ukhola shetani okhuba omulindi wuwe owulali Nyasaye, awo aba asishile (atibile) okhusikha khwa habulafu
(Shetani) abalakanga mana nabasubisia ne shasubisinja liosi liosi tawe halali obubeyi
Abo limenyo liabu nimumulilo kwa jahanamu ne shibalinyoola ubaleshela tawe
